-  DateFormatter.Style.medium 

Case# DateFormatter.Style.medium

iOS 2.0+iPadOS 2.0+Mac Catalyst 13.0+macOS 10.0+tvOS 9.0+visionOS 1.0+watchOS 2.0+

```
case medium
```

## [Discussion](/documentation/foundation/dateformatter/style/medium#Discussion)

Specifies a medium style, typically with abbreviated text, such as “Nov 23, 1937” or “3:30:32 PM”.

Equal to `kCFDateFormatterMediumStyle`.
